title: Google\Cloud\Eventarc\V1\ListTriggersRequest
name: ListTriggersRequest
description:
The request message for the ListTriggers method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.eventarc.v1.ListTriggersRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The parent collection to list triggers on.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: The maximum number of triggers to return on each page. Note: The service may send fewer.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: The page token; provide the value from the next_page_token field in a previous ListTriggers call to retrieve the subsequent page. When paginating, all other parameters provided to ListTriggers must match the call that provided the page token.

params.name: data.order_by
params.description: The sorting order of the resources returned. Value should be a comma-separated list of fields. The default sorting order is ascending. To specify descending order for a field, append a desc suffix; for example: name desc, trigger_id.
